text: Ittiri (Ìtiri Cannèdu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 8,619 people lived there. Its area is 111.46 km². It is 400 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Ittiri
